mapper.select: select v3.vs_id as id,vs_title as title,vs_type,count as optionNum,man as toupiaoNum from ((select v1.vs_id as vs_id,vi_id as man,vs_title,vs_type from vote_subject v1 left join vote_item v2 on v1.vs_id = v2.vs_id) v3 left join (select vs_id,count(vs_id) as count from vote_option group by vs_id) v4 on v3.vs_id = v4.vs_id) limit #{start}, #{end}
